name: Priya Nair
persona: Priya Nair is a dedicated and highly motivated sophomore majoring in Biomedical Engineering. She consistently sets ambitious academic goals and puts in sustained effort to achieve them, reflected in her impressive CGPA. Priya is confident in her ability to master challenging material and manages stress effectively, allowing her to perform well under pressure. Her strong perseverance and self-discipline make her a reliable team member in group projects, and she is always eager to take on new challenges in her field.
